answerText: Tom Stoppard [10] In Travesties, Henry Carr's memories become mixed up with characters and situations from a production of this play by a different author.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | NYU A + MSU + Caltech A | 17 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man wrote a play in which Henry leaves his actress wife Charlotte for his activist mistress, Annie, only for Annie to have an affair of her own. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this author of The Real Thing who wrote about Henry Carr's experiences with James Joyce, Vladimir Lenin, and Tristan Tzara while in Zurich in his play Travesties.
